document_name: Royal Decree No. 90 of 2007 Establishing the Ministry of Environment and Climate Affairs
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/OMN/2007/OMN-2007-09-09-Royal Decree No. 90 of 2007 Establishing the Ministry of Environment and Climate Affairs_01afe50bca3ea58e8c166b7776889e07.pdf
document_description: Royal Decree No. 90 of 2007 establishes the Ministry of Environment and Climate Affairs out of the Ministry of Regional Municipalities, Environment and Water Resources.
